verses.t: When{G5613} therefore{G3767} the Lord{G3588} knew{G1097} how{G3754} the Pharisees{G3588} had heard{G191} that{G3754} Jesus{G2424} made{G4160} and{G2532} baptized{G907} more{G4119} disciples{G3101} than{G2228} John{G2491},
(Though{G2544} Jesus{G2424} himself{G846} baptized{G907} not{G3756}, but{G235} his{G846} disciples{G3588},)
He left{G863} Judæa{G3588}, and{G2532} departed{G565} again{G3825} into{G1519} Galilee{G3588}.
And{G1161} he{G846} must needs{G1163} go{G1330} through{G1223} Samaria{G3588}.

Then{G3767} cometh he{G2064} to{G1519} a city{G4172} of Samaria{G3588}, which is called{G3004} Sychar{G4965}, near{G4139} to the parcel of ground{G3588} that{G3739} Jacob{G2384} gave{G1325} to{G3588} his{G846} son{G5207} Joseph{G2501}.

Now{G1161} Jacob's{G2384} well{G4077} was{G2258} there{G1563}. Jesus{G2424} therefore{G3767}, being wearied{G2872} with{G1537} his journey{G3588}, sat{G2516} thus{G3779} on{G1909} the well{G3588}: and it was{G2258} about{G5616} the{G5610} sixth{G1623} hour{G5610}.
There cometh{G2064} a woman{G1135} of{G1537} Samaria{G3588} to draw{G501} water{G5204}: Jesus{G3588} saith{G3004} unto her{G846}, Give{G1325} me{G3427} to drink{G4095}.
(For{G1063} his{G846} disciples{G3101} were gone away{G565} unto{G1519} the city{G3588} to{G2443} buy{G59} meat{G5160}.)

Then{G3767} saith{G3004} the woman{G3588} of Samaria{G3588} unto him{G846}, How is it that{G4459} thou{G4771}, being{G5607} a Jew{G2453}, askest{G154} drink{G4095} of{G3844} me{G1700}, which am{G5607} a woman{G1135} of Samaria{G4542}? for{G1063} the Jews{G2453} have{G4798} no{G3756} dealings{G4798} with the Samaritans{G4541}.

Jesus{G2424} answered{G611} and{G2532} said{G2036} unto her{G846}, If{G1487} thou knewest{G1492} the gift{G3588} of God{G3588}, and{G2532} who{G5101} it is{G2076} that saith{G3004} to thee{G4671}, Give{G1325} me{G3427} to drink{G4095}; thou{G4771} wouldest have asked{G154} of him{G846}, and{G2532} he would have given{G1325} thee{G4671} living{G2198} water{G5204}.

The woman{G3588} saith{G3004} unto him{G846}, Sir{G2962}, thou hast{G2192} nothing{G3777} to draw with{G502}, and{G2532} the well{G3588} is{G2076} deep{G901}: from whence{G4159} then{G3767} hast thou{G2192} that{G3588} living{G2198} water{G5204}?

Art{G1488} thou{G4771} greater than{G3187} our{G2257} father{G3588} Jacob{G2384}, which{G3739} gave{G1325} us{G2254} the well{G3588}, and{G2532} drank{G4095} thereof{G846} himself{G846}, and{G2532} his{G846} children{G3588}, and{G2532} his{G846} cattle{G3588}?ex autou (thereof) - ex empty
Jesus{G3588} answered{G611} and{G2532} said{G2036} unto her{G846}, Whosoever{G3956} drinketh{G4095} of{G1537} this{G5127} water{G3588} shall thirst{G1372} again{G3825}:

But{G1161} whosoever{G3739} drinketh{G4095} of{G1537} the water{G3588} that{G3739} I{G1473} shall give{G1325} him{G846} shall never{G3588} thirst{G1372}; but{G235} the water{G3588} that{G3739} I shall give{G1325} him{G846} shall be{G1096} in{G1722} him{G846} a well{G4077} of water{G5204} springing up{G242} into{G1519} everlasting{G166} life{G2222}.ou mee eis ton aioona (never) - tagged to aioona

The woman{G3588} saith{G3004} unto{G4314} him{G846}, Sir{G2962}, give{G1325} me{G3427} this{G5124} water{G3588}, that{G2443} I thirst{G1372} not{G3361}, neither{G3366} come{G2064} hither{G1759} to draw{G501}.
Jesus{G3588} saith{G3004} unto her{G846}, Go{G5217}, call{G5455} thy{G4675} husband{G3588}, and{G2532} come{G2064} hither{G1759}.

The woman{G3588} answered{G611} and{G2532} said{G2036}, I have{G2192} no{G3756}husband{G435}. Jesus{G3588} said{G3004} unto her{G846}, Thou hast{G2036} well{G2573} said{G2036}, I have{G2192} no{G3756} husband{G435}:

For{G1063} thou hast had{G2192} five{G4002} husbands{G435}; and{G2532} he whom{G3739} thou{G2192} now{G3568} hast{G2192} is{G2076} not{G3756} thy{G4675} husband{G435}: in that{G5124} saidst thou{G2046} truly{G227}.
The woman{G3588} saith{G3004} unto him{G846}, Sir{G2962}, I perceive{G2334} that{G3754} thou{G4771} art{G1488} a prophet{G4396}.

Our{G2257} fathers{G3588} worshipped{G4352} in{G1722} this{G5129} mountain{G3588}; and{G2532} ye{G5210} say{G3004}, that{G3754} in{G1722} Jerusalem{G2414} is{G2076} the place{G3588} where{G3699} men ought{G1163} to worship{G4352}.

Jesus{G3588} saith{G3004} unto her{G846}, Woman{G1135}, believe{G4100} me{G3427}, the hour{G5610} cometh{G2064}, when{G3753} ye shall{G4352} neither{G3777} in{G1722} this{G5129} mountain{G3588}, nor yet{G3777} at{G1722} Jerusalem{G2414}, worship{G4352} the Father{G3588}.
Ye{G5210} worship{G4352} ye know{G1492} not{G3756} what{G3739}: we{G2249} know{G1492} what{G3739} we worship{G4352}: for{G3754} salvation{G3588} is{G2076} of{G1537} the Jews{G2453}.

But{G235} the hour{G5610} cometh{G2064}, and{G2532} now{G3568} is{G2076}, when{G3753} the{G4353} true{G228} worshippers{G4353} shall worship{G4352} the Father{G3588} in{G1722} spirit{G4151} and{G2532} in truth{G225}: for{G1063} the Father{G3588} seeketh{G2212} such{G5108} to worship{G4352} him{G846}.
God{G3588} is a Spirit{G4151}: and{G2532} they that worship{G4352} him{G846} must{G1163} worship{G4352} him in{G1722} spirit{G4151} and{G2532} in truth{G225}.

The woman{G3588} saith{G3004} unto him{G846}, I know{G1492} that{G3754} Messias{G3323} cometh{G2064}, which is called{G3004} Christ{G5547}: when{G3752} he{G1565} is come{G2064}, he will tell{G312} us{G2254} all things{G3956}.
Jesus{G3588} saith{G3004} unto her{G846}, I{G1473} that speak{G2980} unto thee{G4671} am{G1510} he.

And{G2532} upon{G1909} this{G5129} came{G2064} his{G846} disciples{G3588}, and{G2532} marvelled{G2296} that{G3754} he talked{G2980} with{G3326} the woman{G1135}: yet{G3305} no man{G3762} said{G2036}, What{G5101} seekest thou{G2212}? or{G2228}, Why{G5101} talkest thou{G2980} with{G3326} her{G846}?
The woman{G3588} then{G3767} left{G863} her{G846} waterpot{G3588}, and{G2532} went her way{G565} into{G1519} the city{G3588}, and{G2532} saith{G3004} to the men{G3588},
Come{G1205}, see{G1492} a man{G444}, which{G3739} told{G2036} me{G3427} all things{G3956} that ever{G3745} I did{G4160}: is{G2076} not{G3385} this{G3778} the Christ{G3588}?
Then{G3767} they went out{G1831} of{G1537} the city{G3588}, and{G2532} came{G2064} unto{G4314} him{G846}.
In{G1722} the mean while{G3342} his disciples{G3588} prayed{G2065} him{G846}, saying{G3004}, Master{G4461}, eat{G5315}.
But{G1161} he said{G2036} unto them{G846}, I{G1473} have{G2192} meat{G1035} to eat{G5315} that{G3739} ye{G5210} know{G1492} not{G3756} of.
Therefore{G3767} said{G3004} the disciples{G3588} one{G240} to{G4314} another{G240}, Hath{G5342} any man{G5100} brought{G5342} him{G846} ought to eat{G5315}?
Jesus{G3588} saith{G3004} unto them{G846}, My{G1699} meat{G1033} is{G2076} to{G2443} do{G4160} the will{G3588} of him that sent{G3992} me{G3165}, and{G2532} to finish{G5048} his{G846} work{G3588}.

Say{G3004} not{G3756} ye{G5210}, There are{G2076} yet{G2089} four months{G5072}, and{G2532} then cometh{G2064} harvest{G3588}? behold{G2400}, I say{G3004} unto you{G5213}, Lift up{G1869} your{G5216} eyes{G3588}, and{G2532} look on{G2300} the fields{G3588}; for{G3754} they are{G1526} white{G3022} already{G2235} to{G4314} harvest{G2326}.

And{G2532} he that reapeth{G2325} receiveth{G2983} wages{G3408}, and{G2532} gathereth{G4863} fruit{G2590} unto{G1519} life{G2222} eternal{G166}: that{G2443} both{G2532} he that soweth{G4687} and{G2532} he that reapeth{G2325} may rejoice{G5463} together{G3674}.
And{G1063} herein{G1722} is{G2076} that{G5129} saying{G3588} true{G228}, One{G243} soweth{G4687}, and{G2532} another{G243} reapeth{G2325}.estin ho speiroon (soweth) - estin empty

I{G1473} sent{G649} you{G5209} to reap{G2325} that whereon{G3739} ye{G5210} bestowed{G2872} no{G3756} labour{G2872}: other men{G243} laboured{G2872}, and{G2532} ye{G5210} are entered{G1525} into{G1519} their{G846} labours{G3588}.

And{G1161} many{G4183} of{G1537} the Samaritans{G3588} of that{G1565} city{G3588} believed{G4100} on{G1519} him{G846} for{G1223} the saying{G3588} of the woman{G3588}, which testified{G3140}, He told{G2036} me{G3427} all{G3956} that ever{G3745} I did{G4160}.

So{G3767} when{G5613} the Samaritans{G3588} were come{G2064} unto{G4314} him{G846}, they besought{G2065} him{G846} that he would tarry{G3306} with{G3844} them{G846}: and{G2532} he abode{G3306} there{G1563} two{G1417} days{G2250}.
And{G2532} many{G4183} more{G4119} believed{G4100} because{G1223} of{G3588} his own{G846} word{G3056};

Now{G1161} after{G3326} two{G1417} days{G2250} he departed{G1831} thence{G1564}, and{G2532} went{G565} into{G1519} Galilee{G3588}
For{G1063} Jesus{G3588} himself{G846} testified{G3140}, that{G3754} a prophet{G4396} hath{G2192} no{G3756} honour{G5092} in{G1722} his own{G2398} country{G3968}.

Then{G3767} when{G3753} he was come{G2064} into{G1519} Galilee{G3588}, the Galilæans{G3588} received{G1209} him{G846}, having seen{G3708} all the things{G3956} that{G3739} he did{G4160} at{G1722} Jerusalem{G2414} at{G1722} the feast{G3588}: for{G1063} they{G846} also{G2532} went{G2064} unto{G1519} the feast{G3588}.

So{G3767} Jesus{G3588} came{G2064} again{G3825} into{G1519} Cana{G2580} of Galilee{G3588}, where{G3699} he made{G4160} the water{G3588} wine{G3631}. And{G2532} there was{G2258} a certain{G5100} nobleman{G937}, whose{G3739} son{G3588} was sick{G770} at{G1722} Capernaum{G2584}.

When{G191} he{G3778} heard{G191} that{G3754} Jesus{G2424} was come{G2240} out of{G1537} Judæa{G3588} into{G1519} Galilee{G3588}, he went{G565} unto{G4314} him{G846}, and{G2532} besought{G2065} him{G846} that{G2443} he would come down{G2597}, and{G2532} heal{G2390} his{G846} son{G3588}: for{G1063} he was at the point of{G3195} death{G599}.
Then{G3767} said{G2036} Jesus{G3588} unto{G4314} him{G846}, Except{G3361} ye see{G1492} signs{G4592} and{G2532} wonders{G5059}, ye will{G4100} not{G3361} believe{G4100}.
The nobleman{G937} saith{G3004} unto{G4314} him{G846}, Sir{G2962}, come down{G2597} ere{G4250} my{G3450} child{G3588} die{G599}.

Jesus{G3588} saith{G3004} unto him{G846}, Go thy way{G4198}; thy{G4675} son{G3588} liveth{G2198}. And{G2532} the man{G3588} believed{G4100} the word{G3588} that{G3739} Jesus{G2424} had spoken{G2036} unto him{G846}, and{G2532} he went his way{G4198}.
And{G1161} as{G2235} he{G846} was{G2597} now{G2235} going down{G2597}, his{G846} servants{G3588} met{G528} him{G846}, and{G2532} told{G518} him, saying{G3004}, Thy{G4675} son{G3588} liveth{G2198}.

Then{G3767} enquired he{G4441} of{G3844} them{G846} the hour{G3588} when{G1722} he began{G2192} to amend{G2866}. And{G2532} they said{G2036} unto him{G846}, Yesterday{G5504} at the{G5610} seventh{G1442} hour{G5610} the fever{G3588} left{G863} him{G846}.

So{G3767} the father{G3588} knew{G1097} that{G3754} it was at{G1722} the same{G1565} hour{G3588}, in{G1722} the which{G3739} Jesus{G3588} said{G2036} unto him{G846}, Thy{G4675} son{G3588} liveth{G2198}: and{G2532} himself{G846} believed{G4100}, and{G2532} his{G846} whole{G3650} house{G3588}.
This{G5124} is again{G3825} the{G4592} second{G1208} miracle{G4592} that Jesus{G3588} did{G4160}, when he was come{G2064} out of{G1537} Judæa{G3588} into{G1519} Galilee{G3588}.
